Teacher Spotlight

The public charter school board recognized me as one of the best teachers in the district. In addition, I was nominated for a teacher of the year award.

Khan Academy Ambassador

I was selected by Khan Academy to become an Ambassador with the responsibility of training teachers and encouraging students to pursue mathematics and computer science.

NASA Space Academy for Educators Graduate

I won a scholarship to attend a week long reteat at NASA's Space Academy for Educators program, where I learned how to increase engagement and outcomes for my students.
